title: Rise of the Penguins
description: RISE OF THE PENGUINS captures the story of the War of the Species, organized by the Emperor Penguin dubbed the Overlord, who united all penguins into a defensive coalition designed to attack humans. However, not all are content under the Overlord's rule and a resistance soon arises. The novel explores the themes of war, revenge, and the brutalization of the environment.
author: Steven  Hammond
